In England, in the seven days to 03 July, there were 148,555 new confirmed cases (263.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 26 June, there were 90,288 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 65% (58,267 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 08 July is 4,362,481 (7,750.4 cases per 100,000 population).
